channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: ディズニー、インドと東南アジア諸国のDisney+ Hotstarを除いたDisney+ Coreの第2四半期加入者数は前四半期比6％増の1億1760万人と予想を上回る（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Disney reports Disney+ Core, which excludes Disney+ Hotstar in India and other Southeast Asian countries, subscribers up 6% QoQ to 117.6M in Q2, above forecasts  —  Company takes $2 billion goodwill-impairment charge for Star India and linear entertainment networks

item.title: ディズニー、第2四半期の売上高は前年同期比1％増の220億8,000万ドル（予想221億1,000万ドル）、Disney+とHuluは初の四半期黒字を達成。
item.description:
CNBC:
Disney reports Q2 revenue up 1% YoY to $22.08B, vs. $22.11B est., with Disney+ and Hulu hitting a combined quarterly profit for the first time; DIS drops 6%+  —  The “Partners” statue of Walt Disney and Mickey Mouse, at Cinderella Castle at the Magic Kingdom, at Walt Disney World …

item.title: インドの総選挙期間中に政治広告を掲載する承認を得たフェイスブックアカウントの闇市場があることが調査で判明、干渉の懸念が高まる（Tech Transparency Project）
item.description:
Tech Transparency Project:
An investigation finds a black market for Facebook accounts that have approval to run political ads during India's general election, raising interference fears  —  Facebook hosts a thriving black market for fake and stolen accounts.  Some sellers are offering accounts that can run political ads in India …

item.title: コメディアンのバート・クライシャー、テイラー・トムリンソン、チェルシー・ハンドラーが、2023年に9億ドル以上を売り上げたスタンダップコメディのブームと、それにおけるネットフリックスの役割について語ったQ&A（Lucas Shaw/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Lucas Shaw / Bloomberg:
Q&A with comedians Bert Kreischer, Taylor Tomlinson, and Chelsea Handler on the boom in standup comedy, which grossed $900M+ in 2023, and Netflix's role in it  —  Bert Kreischer, Taylor Tomlinson and Chelsea Handler discuss the boom in stand-up comedy — and Netflix's role in it.

item.title: YouTube、AIを利用して多くの視聴者がスキップする動画の部分にジャンプできる「Jump Ahead」を、Androidアプリを利用する米国のプレミアム会員全員に展開（Adamya Sharma/Android Authority）
item.description:
Adamya Sharma / Android Authority:
YouTube rolls out Jump Ahead, which uses AI to let users jump to parts of a video where most viewers skip ahead, to all US Premium members using its Android app  —  It's currently available in the US on the YouTube Android app.  —  •  —  TL;DR  — YouTube Premium members in the US …

item.title: 2023年のカリフォルニア州の洪水報道で、デジタル専用のローカルニュース「Lookout Santa Cruz」がニュース速報部門のピューリッツァー賞を受賞、ロイターは2部門を受賞した（Joseph Ax/Reuters）
item.description:
Joseph Ax / Reuters:
Lookout Santa Cruz, a digital-only local news outlet, won the breaking news reporting Pulitzer for its 2023 California floods coverage; Reuters won two prizes  —  Reuters won two Pulitzer Prizes on Monday, taking home the national reporting award for a series of investigations …

item.title: NYTとWaPoがそれぞれピュリッツァー賞3部門を受賞、公共サービス賞はクラレンス・トーマス判事の金銭絡みを報道したProPublicaが受賞（Michael M Grynbaum/New York Times）
item.description:
Michael M. Grynbaum / New York Times:
NYT and WaPo won three Pulitzers each; the prize for public service went to ProPublica for its coverage of Justice Clarence Thomas' financial entanglements  —  The prize for public service went to ProPublica for coverage of the Supreme Court.  The Pulitzer board also issued a special citation for journalists covering the Middle East.

item.title: 2024年ピューリッツァー賞受賞者：10月7日の報道でNYTが調査報道部門、WaPoとロイターが国内報道部門、NYTが国際報道部門を受賞（Ren LaForme/Poynter）
item.description:
Ren LaForme / Poynter:
2024 Pulitzer Prize winners: NYT for Investigative Reporting, WaPo and Reuters for National Reporting, and NYT for International Reporting for Oct. 7 coverage  —  A live list of the winners of journalism's top honor, including links to the winning stories.  —  The winners of the 2024 Pulitzer Prizes …

item.title: 民主党の献金者がジョー・バイデンに対する親パレスチナデモに資金提供しているというポリティコのバイラル記事は不正確なものばかりで、ポリティコはいくつかの訂正を発表した（Andrew Perez/Rolling Stone）。
item.description:
Andrew Perez / Rolling Stone:
A viral Politico story on Democratic donors funding the pro-Palestine protests against Joe Biden is full of inaccuracies; Politico issued some corrections  —  After Rolling Stone reached out, Politico corrected its story to note that the Bill and Melinda Gates Foundation does not fund the groups it claimed

item.title: 2024年のメットガラでピケ隊を出すと組合幹部が露骨に脅していたのに、ナスト社が契約条件に暫定合意した（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Condé Nast's tentative agreement to contract terms came after the union leaders had explicitly threatened to stage a picket line at the 2024 Met Gala  —  After more than a year of talks, Condé Nast management inked an employment pact with hundreds of union workers at Vogue …

item.title: サイモン＆シュスターがオランダの出版社ヴィーン・ボッシュ＆クーニングを買収、英語以外の書籍出版社としては初の契約、VBKは編集の独立性を維持（Sabela Ojea/Wall Street Journal）
item.description:
Sabela Ojea / Wall Street Journal:
Simon & Schuster acquires Dutch publisher Veen Bosch & Keuning, its first deal for a non-English book publisher; VBK will maintain its editorial independence  —  VBK to operate as an autonomous division and maintain its editorial independence  —  Simon & Schuster is acquiring Dutch …

item.title: メモヴォーグ』『ヴァニティ・フェア』などのスタッフを代表する労働組合とナスト社が、1年以上にわたる交渉の末、初の契約に関する暫定合意に達した（Perri Ormont Blumberg/New York Times）。
item.description:
Perri Ormont Blumberg / New York Times:
Memo: Condé Nast and the union representing staff at Vogue, Vanity Fair, and others reach a tentative deal for a first contract after over a year of bargaining  —  The company on Monday reached a tentative contract agreement with unionized employees who said they were willing …

item.title: ESPNの司会者スティーブン・A・スミスのプロフィールは、彼の長寿と意見を伝える不思議な能力によって、スポーツ界で最も有名なトーキングヘッドとなった（Ben Strauss/Washington Post）
item.description:
Ben Strauss / Washington Post:
A profile of ESPN's First Take host Stephen A. Smith, whose longevity and uncanny ability to deliver opinions made him the most famous talking head in sports  —  Sports, politics, sex, SpongeBob: There's nothing ESPN's biggest star won't argue about — as long as you keep listening.

item.title: メットガラに間に合うように、そしてついに、Condé Nastと数百人のスタッフを代表する労働組合との間の暫定契約を発表するメモが発表された［画像］（Brian Stelter/@brianstelter）
item.description:
Brian Stelter / @brianstelter:
Just in time for the Met Gala, and at long last, here's the memo announcing a tentative contract between Condé Nast and the union representing hundreds of staffers [image]

item.title: AIツールの追加、Quoraのチャットボットプラットフォーム「Poe」での開発者サポート、QuoraとOpenAIの関係などについて、Quoraのアダム・ダンジェロCEOにインタビュー（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
An interview with Quora CEO Adam D'Angelo on adding AI tools, supporting developers on Quora's chatbot platform Poe, Quora's relationship with OpenAI, and more  —  Last November, Adam D'Angelo found himself at the epicenter of one of the biggest controversies in the tech industry.
